snippet.title: Jesse van Ruller in circles
snippet.description:
Jesse van Ruller in circles
30 Jan 2014 by peterstinckens on Sten Stinus stenstinus.wordpress.com/2014/01/30/jesse-van-ruller-in-circles/
Jesse van Ruller playing "circles" with Joris Roelofs and Clemens van der Feen at his side. A great concert in contemporary music. Enjoy it! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kuPajjEMr9c
Topics: Great Music, Jesse van Ruller

snippet.title: Dutchbopper
snippet.description:
Dutchbopper
7 Jan 2013 by DJ on Jazz Guitar Scene jazzguitarscene.wordpress.com/2013/01/07/373/
Dutch bop guitarist Dick Onstenk has a great blog here worth checking out, this month he interviews great NL guitarist Jesse Van Ruller http://dutchbopper.blogspot.nl/
Topics: Jazz Gtr Interviews
